FREE TO SUBSCRIBERS Journey to Section X, a previously-untouched area of Belsavis. Uncover the ancient weapon the Dread Master's servants are searching for and secure or destroy it!
Section X is a Level 50 area.
Initial purchase includes the Legacy Perk: Speeder Piloting I. This Legacy Perk is not included when retrieving this item from Collections.

This grants the ability Speeder Piloting I at level 1, allowing the use of many Speeders. This ability is usually available at level 10 for Subscribers and 20 for Free-to-Play Players.
This grants the ability Speeder Piloting II at level 10. This ability is usually available at level 25 for Subscribers and 35 for Free-to-Play Players.

This grants the ability Speeder Piloting III at level 25, allowing the use of all Speeders. Speeder Piloting III increases your movement speed while on Speeders by 110%. This ability is usually available at level 35 for Subscribers and 45 for Free-to-Play Players.
A secretive, mysterious people, the blue-skinned Chiss are the only official allies of the Sith Empire, making them a subject of interest to everyone else.
Humans enhanced by cybernetic implants--some to compensate for injuries, others to enhance their combat abilities.
Born without eyes, the near-human Miraluka possess the unusual ability to see with the Force, viewing all the galaxy by how the Force moves through it.
The deeply spiritual Mirialan people have a religion built around a basic concept of the Force and tattoo geometric designs onto their faces to celebrate life achievements.
Born and bred in a culture of war, Rattataki tattoo harsh, deep black symbols across their white skin and never walk away from a fight.
Descendants of the alien species that gave the name to the Sith Order and humans, Purebloods have a high percentage of Force sensitivity and sharp bone ridges.
Instantly identifiable by their colorful skin and long head tails (called "lekku"), the Twi'lek people have long been oppressed, with only the rare group escaping slavery.
Fiercely independent and identifiable by their horns and facial tattoos, Zabraks have two visually different cultural groups split almost perfectly between Republic and Imperial space.

Digital Expansion: Rise of the Hutt Cartel

The first digital expansion for Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ increases the level cap to 55! Join your faction in explosive combat against the nefarious Hutt Cartel to determine the fate of the mysterious new planet Makeb. The next chapter in your saga begins now!
Continue your Star Wars saga with an increased level cap of 55!
Earn new abilities, skill points, gear, and more as your character advances!
Epic story content with fully-voiced cinematic conversations as you uncover the diabolical plot of The Hutt Cartel to become the new Galactic superpower.
Explore a vibrant alien landscape as the Galactic Republic and Sith Empire fight for control over a powerful secret.

Designed before the start of the Great Galactic War, the Kuat Drive Yards TZ-24 Enforcer remains a highly popular design, and serves as the mainstay of dozens of planetary defense forces throughout the Republic.
Adapted from the larger TZ-2 transport, the TZ-24 Gladiator was designed to serve as a rugged, no-frills combat fighter for long campaigns in remote regions.

Although the Republic military officially passed on Czerka's IL-5 Skybolt in favor of designs from Corellia StarDrive, a number of regional governors and "flexible" fleet admirals have made the craft a common sight on Republic flight decks.
The Thermal Retention Set is a collection of adaptive gear with no modifications. This armor set is available to any class.
Despite its original intent as a Republic starfighter (under the name "Skybolt") it was Imperial military officials who showed a particular fondness for the design, ordering thousands of the craft.
Upon using this item the Ship will be visible in the Hangar.

A custom gunship design sold to "discerning customers" all over the galaxy with no questions asked, Hyrotii's K-52 Demolisher was first popularized within the Empire after its purchase by Dark Council member Darth Marr.

Republic forces have increasingly recruited additional support from privateers, mercenaries, and other nonmilitary sources. These "free spirited" individuals often take great pride in their personal craft, with the Hyrotii K-52 Strongarm being one of the most popular.
This prototype Imperial Gunship comes with all the functionality of a GSS-3 Mangler.
This prototype Republic Gunship comes with all the functionality of a SGS-45 Quarrel.
Distributed for joining the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ community from Amazon.

After Republic pilots first encountered the Empire's VX-9 Mailoc gunship in battle, their first request was that their superiors get them "a ship like that!" The Strategic Information Service volunteered to do just that, undertaking a lengthy and complex operation to infiltrate the Dromund Kalakar shipyards and acquire the Mailoc's design specifications. The mission was a complete success, and Republic pilots have gladly employed the Redeemer against its original designers in battle ever since.
This prototype Republic Gunship comes with all the functionality of a SGS-45 Quarrel.
Although it is no longer fielded as widely as newer designs, the VX-9 Mailoc gunship is still produced at Dromund Kalakar shipyards, and remains a favorite of many veteran Imperial pilots.
This prototype Imperial Gunship comes with all the functionality of a GSS-3 Mangler.
Granted to all players who subscribed to Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ as of March, 2014.

A common joke suggests that GSI only produces the G-X1 Firehauler because it encourages additional sales of their many explosive munitions, but there are very few bomber pilots in the Republic who would turn down the chance to fly one on any given mission.
A relatively new addition to Imperial starfighter complements, the GSI-produced G-X1 Onslaught is already earning a stellar reputation among first-run pilots.
This prototype Republic Bomber comes with all the functionality of a Warcarrier.
This prototype Imperial Bomber comes with all the functionality of a B-4D Legion.
